title: Python Basics
summary: Python is a high-level programming language used for automation, data analysis, AI, backend development, and more. It uses simple syntax and supports multiple paradigms.
sample_question: What is the difference between a list and a tuple in Python?

title: SQL Fundamentals
summary: SQL (Structured Query Language) is used to store, manage, and query data in relational databases.
sample_question: What is the difference between WHERE and HAVING in SQL?

title: Computer Networking
summary: Networking refers to connecting computers to share data. Key concepts include IP addresses, routers, switches, and networking protocols.
sample_question: What is the difference between TCP and UDP?

title: Cloud Computing
summary: Cloud computing enables remote servers for storage, computing, networking, and software delivery. Popular providers: AWS, Azure, GCP.
sample_question: What is IaaS, PaaS, and SaaS?

title: Operating System
summary: An OS manages hardware, processes, memory, and provides services to applications.
sample_question: What is the difference between process and thread?
